user_instruction: 'Compose an email to get ConstructCo Solutions started on the new project. You can check out my Gmail and Notion for information.'

formatted_items.arguments:
{"to":["team@constructcosolutions.com"],"subject":"Downtown Highrise Project – Next Steps & Onboarding","body":"Hello ConstructCo Solutions Team,

Welcome aboard! We’re excited to partner with you on the Downtown Highrise project.

To help you hit the ground running, I’ve attached the following documents:
• A high-level project schedule outlining the major phases from groundbreaking in early spring to final hand-over early next fall.
• A concise scope summary highlighting your deliverables and quality standards.
• The draft subcontractor agreement for your review.

Immediate actions for your team:
1. Review the attached documents and confirm that the outlined responsibilities align with your expectations.
2. Identify your proposed site supervisor and core team members.
3. Share any preliminary questions or resource needs.

Kick-off meeting:
I’d like to hold a virtual kick-off meeting next week to introduce teams, walk through the schedule, and clarify open items. Please send your availability for the middle of next week and I will send out a calendar invite.

Site access & safety:
All personnel will need to complete our safety orientation before visiting the site. Once your team list is confirmed, I’ll forward the orientation materials and access guidelines.

Looking forward to a smooth start and a successful project together.

Best regards,
Jane Doe
Civil Engineering Technician | Project Manager
"}
